Generate a climate data frame of spatial averages from the file reference object generated by cstdata. Averages represent all grid cells within or touching the area of interest provided to cstdata.

Source: R/cst_df.R
cst_df.Rd

Generate a climate data frame of spatial averages from the file reference object generated by cstdata. Averages represent all grid cells within or touching the area of interest provided to cstdata.

cst_df(file_reference, ncores = 1)

Arguments

file_reference

A file reference data frame generated by `cstdata()`
ncores

Number of cores to use (int)

Value

A tibble of climate data averaged spatially over an area of interest.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
file_ref <- cstdata(park = "Acadia National Park",
                    parameters = "pr",
                    years = c(2020, 2021),
                    models = "CCSM4",
                    scenarios = "rcp85")
df <- cst_df(file_ref, cores = parallel::detectCores())
}
